name: Peppers Stuffed with Cream Cheese and Sausage
author: HazelCooks
summary: A delicious, easy stuffed pepper recipe. A go-to if your family loves cream cheese!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
1 tablespoon bacon bits, or to taste
1 clove garlic, minced, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 large bell peppers - halved, seeded, and stems removed
2 tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a square baking pan with aluminum foil
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Combine cream cheese, Parmesan cheese, bacon bits, and garlic in a bowl
Stir in cooked sausage and season with salt and pepper
Mix with your hands until all ingredients are well combined
Scoop sausage mixture into the pepper halves; press lightly to pack
Bake until stuffing has hardened slightly on the top, 18 to 20 minutes
Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle with Cheddar cheese
Let sit for 5 minutes before removing from the pan
